summary: Only `frontend/public/draft-version.txt` was clearly updated to Draft Version 6. The diff summary does not show actual addition/movement of the required image assets into `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, nor does it show any concrete update to `frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx` image `src` references; those are only mentioned inside `frontend-file-summaries.txt` without corresponding file diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the user-uploaded images referenced by the UI exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (copy/move from root upload directory if missing) so they are served at the exact URLs used by the site, specifically including `1770877868282~2-2.png` and `1770877868282~2-3.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff reports "Added: 0" and does not include any actual file changes for the PNG assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. The only evidence of these assets is a textual mention inside `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, which is not sufficient to confirm the files were actually added/moved into the repository at the required paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all frontend image `src` references (including `frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx`) to point directly to `/assets/generated/...` paths for the moved images, with no remaining references to missing files.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff content is provided for `frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx` (and it is not listed among modified files). The only mention of updated images is in `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, which does not prove the code was changed.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on fixing broken gallery images and updating the draft version marker; it does not request changes to `project_state.json`.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` to describe broad frontend components and assets beyond the requested image-path fix (e.g., App layout, Tailwind config, sections/forms).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating this summary file; it is not required to satisfy REQ-17/18/19 and introduces unrelated descriptive changes.
